column4: guys...i am using ubuntu 8.04...would u suggest upgrading to 8.10 or staying on wit 8.04? thanks for the suggestions
depends what sort of problems you're having
does 8.10 offer any new feature...oh yes internet download speeds r les in 8.04
download speeds are dependent on your ISP connection, ubuntu doesn't change them at all. also, depending on what mirror you connect to.
